The claim stated that the State Bank of: SBP) asked all banks to charge customers Rs2.5 on each transaction and balance inquiry through ATM machines from February 1, 2021.
Several banks issued clarifications via: 4. 1Link, representing 38 banks in Pakistan and operating ATMs across the country, introduced a charge on printing paper ATM receipts for environmental reasons, but this measure was not imposed by the State Bank of Pakistan.
